nodeDomain.title: Livebylife Technologies

body.processed: Digital internet products consultancy. Livebylife Technologies believes in programming solutions to build a better experience.

nodeDomain.field_domain_slogan: Life is about change so let's program the wave of change

body.processed:
Welcome to Livebylife Technologies. I'm Matt, I program web things like websites, application programming interfaces (API's), mobile applications, front-end, back-end, internet of things (IoT), data management, reporting and collection. This means I help companies prototype and launch faster and resolve business critical problems.

Life is about change so let's program it ourselves taking advantage of the latest technologies, stacks, libraries, frameworks, and fundamentals.

Why Livebylife Technologies?

I Like what I do. Which means I want to keep doing it so I keep my skills fresh and keep educating myself on new tech.

Industry Proficiencies      

  • Hospitality & Tourism
  • Construction
  • Small Business / Entrepreneurship
  • Energy and Mining Operations

Contact me to get started!
